description: This file is the entry point for a React-based front-end application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, along with CSS styling and the main App component. It initializes the React application by targeting a DOM element with id 'root' and rendering the App component within React's StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component subtree into the root DOM element.
